item.title: Estimating Apartment Building Standards Scores from Lobby Entrance Ratings
item.description: Introduction As any apartment renter knows, the first impression one has of a building tends to leave a significant mark. Assessment of overall building quality, and by association landlord quality, begins as soon as one walks through the doors. Although we are told never to judge a book by its cover, when it comes to finding a home, it can be difficult to ignore our intuition. When someone enters a building for the first time in hopes of finding a new home and greeted with a broken window or a dirty lobby, the appeal of living there fades immediately.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
